title.rendered: Master’s in Data Science and Business Analytics

content.rendered:
[vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content_no_spaces” equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” css_animation=”fadeIn” css=”.vc_custom_1588727897214{background-color: #f5f4f2 !important;}”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1592751548245{padding-top: 0px !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”16496″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center” css=”.vc_custom_1594323328154{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css_animation=”none” css=”.vc_custom_1593050786470{margin-top: 40px !important;margin-bottom: 40px !important;}” el_id=”overview”][vc_column width=”1/4″ css=”.vc_custom_1592524565715{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”Masters” font_container=”tag:h2|text_align:center” use_theme_fonts=”yes” el_id=”inner-hdln”][vc_wp_custommenu nav_menu=”78″ el_id=”inner-menu”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”3/4″ css=”.vc_custom_1592525599661{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-left: 30px !important;}”][vc_column_text]Masters in Data Science and Business Analytics is a 2 years full time postgraduate course that facilitates one to learn technical skills and practical insights to Data Science. The aim is to provide students with the technical and analytical skills required for acquiring, managing, analyzing and extracting insight from data.

The program combines theory and practice to enable graduates of the program to meet the demands of the data-driven economy of the future.

The program aims at:

  1. Providing students with a strong mathematical and statistics foundation that will enable them to appropriately formulate models and apply optimization techniques for data analyses challenges.
  2. Preparing them to be able to communicate technical ideas effectively through both oral presentations and written reports.
  3. Enabling students to assess the level of privacy and security of a technical solution to a data science problem.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css_animation=”fadeInUp” css=”.vc_custom_1592965186503{background-color: #f5f5f5 !important;}” el_id=”highlights”][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”Key highlights” use_theme_fonts=”yes” el_class=”red-hdln”][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”top” css=”.vc_custom_1592917295641{margin-top: 60px !important;}”][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][vc_single_image image=”16179″ img_size=”100*100″ alignment=”center”][vc_custom_heading text=”University of Mumbai” font_container=”tag:h4|font_size:20px|text_align:center|line_height:30px” use_theme_fonts=”yes” el_class=”red-hdln”][vc_column_text el_class=”txt-justify”]Globally recognised degree from the prestigious 160 years old University of Mumbai. Campus placed at renowned Patkar-Varde college having ‘A+ Grade’ by NAAC.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][vc_single_image image=”16177″ img_size=”100*100″ alignment=”center”][vc_custom_heading text=”Industry Experts” font_container=”tag:h4|font_size:20px|text_align:center|line_height:30px” use_theme_fonts=”yes” el_class=”red-hdln”][vc_column_text el_class=”txt-justify”]Faculties from industry and academia provide a perfect amalgamation of theory and real-life case studies for analyzing and extracting insight from data.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][vc_single_image image=”16180″ img_size=”100*100″ alignment=”center”][vc_custom_heading text=”Scholarships” font_container=”tag:h4|font_size:20px|text_align:center|line_height:30px” use_theme_fonts=”yes” el_class=”red-hdln”][vc_column_text el_class=”txt-justify”]Financial aid available for eligible students in the form of scholarships upto 30% and pay after placement for academically bright students.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][vc_single_image image=”16178″ img_size=”100*100″ alignment=”center”][vc_custom_heading text=”100% Placement Assistance” font_container=”tag:h4|font_size:20px|text_align:center|line_height:30px” use_theme_fonts=”yes” el_class=”red-hdln”][vc_column_text el_class=”txt-justify”]The placement cell has been set up to guide students to communicate technical ideas effectively, help them in resume building and assist them with job placement.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css_animation=”fadeInUp” css=”.vc_custom_1594075045924{margin-top: 10px !important;}” el_id=”softwares”][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”Programming softwares / tools covered” use_theme_fonts=”yes” el_class=”red-hdln” css=”.vc_custom_1593632409727{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}”][vc_column_text]

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css_animation=”fadeInUp” css=”.vc_custom_1593210809296{margin-top: 10px !important;padding-top: 20px !important;background-color: #f5f5f5 !important;}” el_id=”methodology”][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”Training Methodology” use_theme_fonts=”yes” el_class=”red-hdln”][vc_column_text]

“We believe those who advance the furthest in life tend to be those who acquire knowledge at both ends of the spectrum and acquire it in a variety of ways.”

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”10px”][vc_custom_heading text=”Classroom Learning” use_theme_fonts=”yes” el_class=”red-hdln”][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle”][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]

Theory

As a data scientist, your ability to build reliable and efficient models that can be applied to real-world problems depends on how well you know your theoretical concepts.

Practical

Data science is a very hands-on and practical field that requires a solid foundation in programming and visualisation skills. Practical subjects like Python, SQL and Power BI in the syllabus helps gain this expertise.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”16213″ img_size=”full” alignment=”right” style=”vc_box_rounded”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row content_placement=”middle” css_animation=”fadeInUp”][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”Application Based Learning” use_theme_fonts=”yes” el_class=”red-hdln”][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle”][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”16190″ img_size=”full” style=”vc_box_rounded”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]

Case studies

Data Science is all about extracting insights from the data and applying it to your problems. Working on real-world use cases and complex business scenarios prepare you for transitioning from academics to employment.

Industry connects

Data Science experts interact with the students to give them an overview about the Data Science industry, its career opportunities, salary packages, scope for future & the skills that will get them hired.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” content_placement=”middle” css_animation=”fadeInUp” css=”.vc_custom_1593817253749{padding-top: 0px !important;background-color: #f5f5f5 !important;}”][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”Experience based Learning” use_theme_fonts=”yes” el_class=”red-hdln”][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle”][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]

Internships

Internships transforms a student into a fully-trained industry executive with real-time exposure producing highly confident and productive trainees for the Industry with an opportunity to put them on a successful career path.

Projects

Project Based Learning is a teaching method in which students learn by actively engaging in real-world and personally meaningful projects and develop deep content knowledge as well as critical thinking, collaboration, creativity, and communication skills.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”16195″ img_size=”full” alignment=”right” style=”vc_box_rounded”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css_animation=”fadeInUp” css=”.vc_custom_1593210878728{background-color: #413f3f !important;}” el_id=”eligibility”][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”Eligibility Criteria” use_theme_fonts=”yes” el_class=”txt-white”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”5/12″][vc_column_text el_class=”txt-white”]Open for students of all streams (Science/Commerce/Arts) who have a keen interest in statistics, programming and data analysis.[/vc_column_text][vc_btn title=”Know more about QAT” style=”3d” color=”danger” size=”lg” align=”left” i_align=”right” i_icon_fontawesome=”fas fa-share” add_icon=”true” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Fsdbi.in%2Fadmissions%2F%23qat|||” el_class=”mkb-btn-sdbi”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”7/12″][vc_custom_heading text=”There are two ways to apply for the course:” font_container=”tag:p|text_align:center” use_theme_fonts=”yes” el_class=”txt-white mrgn-bnt-zero”][vc_custom_heading text=”Option A” font_container=”tag:p|font_size:30px|text_align:center|line_height:40px” use_theme_fonts=”yes” el_class=”txt-white mrgn-bnt-zero”][vc_column_text el_class=”txt-center txt-white” css=”.vc_custom_1594318323837{margin-bottom: 5px !important;}”]Cleared graduation (Statistics/Computer Science/IT) with 60% and above[/vc_column_text][vc_custom_heading text=”Option B” font_container=”tag:p|font_size:30px|text_align:center|line_height:40px” use_theme_fonts=”yes” el_class=”txt-white mrgn-bnt-zero”][vc_column_text el_class=”txt-center txt-white”]Cleared Quantitative Aptitude Test (QAT) and Personal Interview round.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css_animation=”fadeInUp” css=”.vc_custom_1593210970578{margin-top: 30px !important;}” el_id=”syllabus”][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”Course Syllabus” use_theme_fonts=”yes” el_class=”red-hdln” css=”.vc_custom_1593210984625{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}”][vc_tta_tour style=”outline” color=”blue” spacing=”30″ gap=”5″ autoplay=”10″ active_section=”1″ css=”.vc_custom_1592964948925{margin-top: 30px !important;}” el_class=”mkb-tab-style”][vc_tta_section title=”Semester one” tab_id=”sm1″][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][vc_column_text]This semester introduces students to statistical analysis and several programming tools, data visualisation to transform and clean the data and database management to create, retrieve, update and manage data.[/vc_column_text][vc_custom_heading text=”Paper title” font_container=”tag:h4|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes” el_class=”red-hdln”][vc_column_text]

  • Database Management Systems
  • Big Data architecture and ecosystem
  • Statistical Methods
  • Data Visualization – Using Power BI
  • R Programming
  • Python Programming

[/vc_column_text][vc_raw_html][/vc_raw_html][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Semester two” tab_id=”sem2″][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][vc_column_text]This semester focuses on Machine Learning that automates analytical model building. Students learn to work on big data and advanced SQL to systematically
extract information and draw insights.[/vc_column_text][vc_custom_heading text=”Paper title” font_container=”tag:h4|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes” el_class=”red-hdln”][vc_column_text]

  • Modelling Techniques
  • Machine Learning
  • Distributed Processing using HADOOP
  • Advanced SQL
  • Project Work
  • Business Communication- II

[/vc_column_text][vc_raw_html][/vc_raw_html][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Semester three” tab_id=”sem3″][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][vc_column_text]This semester covers time series forecasting and next generation databases using a high-level language suitable for data science. Students practice examining large pre-existing databases in order to generate new information.[/vc_column_text][vc_custom_heading text=”Paper title” font_container=”tag:h4|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes” el_class=”red-hdln”][vc_column_text]

  • Time Series Analysis and Forecasting
  • Next Generation Database
  • Web and Social Media Analytics
  • Latest Trends in Internet Technologies
  • Data Mining and Warehousing

[/vc_column_text][vc_raw_html][/vc_raw_html][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Semester four” tab_id=”sem4″][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][vc_column_text]In this semester students learn to apply contemporary computing technologies, such as deep learning, Natural language processing and Cloud Computing, to solve practical problems characterized by big data.[/vc_column_text][vc_custom_heading text=”Paper title” font_container=”tag:h4|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes” el_class=”red-hdln”][vc_column_text]

  • Programming in Scala and Spark
  • Principles of Deep Learning
  • Natural Language Processing
  • Cloud Computing and Application
  • Image and Video Analytics
  • Project work – Electives
    • Finance Analytics
    • Marketing Analytics
    • HR Analytics

[/vc_column_text][vc_raw_html][/vc_raw_html][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_tta_section][/vc_tta_tour][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css_animation=”fadeInUp” css=”.vc_custom_1593627067478{padding-top: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 20px !important;background-color: #df3735 !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_custom_heading text=”Need more info about the course ?” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:center|color:%23ffffff” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1594120057246{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}”][vc_btn title=”Download Brochure” style=”3d” size=”lg” align=”center” i_align=”right” i_icon_fontawesome=”fas fa-share” add_icon=”true” link=”url:%23|||” el_class=”mkb-btn-sdbi mkb_masters”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_custom_heading text=”Already Made Up Your Mind?” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:center|color:%23ffffff” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1593919705094{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}”][vc_btn title=”Apply Now” style=”3d” color=”mulled-wine” size=”lg” align=”center” i_align=”right” i_icon_fontawesome=”fas fa-share” add_icon=”true” link=”url:http%3A%2F%2Fadmission.sdbi.in%2Fapp%2F%23%2Fauth%2Fregister||target:%20_blank|rel:nofollow” el_class=”mkb-btn-sdbi mkbpopup2″][/vc_column][/vc_row]
